availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David G. Owen (Carroll County KY farmer)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Blanton Owen. Married to Mary Owen. Father of Jane Owen and Thompson Owen. Owned three enslaved persons in Carroll County in 1850. Farmer in Carroll County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 189B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, p. 84.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 901
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Gallatin County Marriages, Film #000509036, p. 57
Find A Grave, "D. G. Owen (1807-1888)," Memorial #22768833, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22768833 (accessed October 28, 2019).
